start_message: Hello! How can I help you today?\nYou can teach me new responses using the buttons below
help_message:
This bot can learn custom responses. Here are some available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Display this help message
/learn - Teach the bot a new trigger and response (Admin only)
/deletetrigger - Remove a learned trigger (Admin only)
/cancel - Cancel the current learning or deletion process

üëë Admin Management (Admin only):
- `/addadmin [USER_ID]` or reply to a user's message with `/addadmin`
- `/removeadmin [USER_ID]` or reply to a user's message with `/removeadmin`
- `/listadmins`
learn_command_prompt: Let's learn a new trigger!\nWhat phrase should I respond to? (Type /cancel to stop)
learn_ask_response_type: What type of response would you like for "{trigger}"?
learn_prompt_text_response: Alright, a text response. Please send the text for the response. (Type /cancel to stop)
learn_prompt_image_response: Got it, an image response. Please send the image. (Type /cancel to stop)
learn_prompt_gif_response: Understood, a GIF response. Please send the GIF. (Type /cancel to stop)
learn_prompt_sticker_response: Okay, a sticker response. Please send the sticker. (Type /cancel to stop)
learn_response_received_text: Got it! I will respond with the text: "{response}".\nThe trigger "{trigger}" has been successfully learned!
learn_response_received_media: Great! I will respond with this {media_type}.\nThe trigger "{trigger}" has been successfully learned!
learn_howto_add: You can teach me new responses using the /learn command.
learn_trigger_exists: I already know how to respond to "{trigger}". Try a different phrase or type /cancel.
invalid_input_for_trigger: Please send text for the trigger. (Type /cancel to stop)
invalid_response_type: That response type is not supported for learning. Please send text, an image, a GIF, or a sticker. Or type /cancel to stop.
permission_denied_learn: Sorry, only bot admins can teach me new things.
delete_trigger_command_initiated: Let's remove a trigger. Which trigger would you like to delete?
delete_trigger_list_empty: You haven't taught me any triggers yet, so there's nothing to delete.
delete_trigger_confirm_prompt: Are you sure you want to delete the trigger for: "{trigger_text}"?
delete_trigger_not_found_or_failed: Could not delete the trigger for "{trigger_text}". It might have already been deleted or an error occurred.
permission_denied_delete: Sorry, only bot admins can delete triggers.
learn_invalid_type_selection: Invalid selection. Please choose a response type using the buttons or type /cancel.
learn_response_type_mismatch: The content you sent does not match the selected response type ({expected_type}). Please send the correct content or type /cancel.
add_admin_usage: Usage: /addadmin [USER_ID] or reply to a user's message with /addadmin
add_admin_success: User {user_id} has been successfully added as an admin.
add_admin_failed: Failed to add user {user_id} as an admin.
add_admin_invalid_id: Invalid user ID. Please provide a numeric ID.
remove_admin_usage: Usage: /removeadmin [USER_ID] or reply to a user's message with /removeadmin
remove_admin_success: User {user_id} has been successfully removed from the admin list.
remove_admin_failed: Failed to remove user {user_id} from the admin list.
remove_admin_invalid_id: Invalid user ID. Please provide a numeric ID.
list_admins_empty: No admins configured yet (aside from the Super Admin).
permission_denied_admin_command: Sorry, only bot admins can use this command.
